metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010190 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: mgetty prior to 1.2.1 is affected by: out-of-bounds read. The impact is: DoS, the program may crash if the memory is not mapped. The component is: putwhitespan() in g3/pbm2g3.c. The attack vector is: Local, the victim must open a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: mgetty package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
